titleStmt.title: A declaration and svmmons sent by the Earl of Newcastle, to the town of Manchester, to lay down their arms. With the resolute answer of the commanders in chief, and souldiers in Manchester, to spend their blood for the honour of the King, the Protestant religion, and the priviledges of Parliament, against the papists and malignants now under his lordships command.
Declaration and summons sent by the Earl of Newcastle to the town of Manchester.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole, and are to be sold at the Glove in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
